dct_title_s: Novæ Hispaniæ, Chili, Peruviæ, et Guatimalæ Littoræ
dct_description_sm: 2 bar scales on map, given in “Geometrische of Duytshce Mylen” (or “Miliaria Geometrica”) and “France Mylen” (or “Miliaria Gallica”).
Oriented with north toward left of sheet.
Decorative cartouche with allegorical figures, cherub, sea monster.
From Renard's Atlas de la Navigation et du Commerce, Amsterdam, 1715.
dct_rights_sm: Images from the The Renaissance Exploration Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
